name: Malevich in Budapest
description:
Malevich was a painter of abstract art. The color pallet is based on one of his paintings.  Ask: "What would the Black Square of games look like?" And what is it with Budapest? Nothing, just sounds nice.

Suprematist Composition - Kazimir Malevich

Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Nunito?sort=popularity
